name: Class naming convention
description: ABAP classes should begin with YCL, ZCL, or LCL. This reports shows all the ABAP classes not starting with one of these these prefixes. Prefixes are parameters and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all ABAP classes that does not respect the naming conventions.
It provides the following information:
ABAP Class full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected.
reference:
help.sap.com
Naming Conventions in ABAP Objects
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention.
